instructions.overview: SharePoint driver provides access to SharePoint Online and SharePoint Server data including lists, libraries, and metadata. It supports querying list items, documents, and site structure through SharePoint REST API.

dataModel.hierarchy: Site Collection → Site → List/Library → Items/Documents → Fields. Each site contains multiple lists and libraries, which contain items with associated fields.
dataModel.relationships: Items belong to Lists (ListId). Documents belong to Libraries (LibraryId). Users can be members of Groups. Permissions are assigned to Users/Groups on Lists/Items. ContentTypes define field schemas.

queryPatterns.timeFiltering: Use Created, Modified fields with ISO format. Example: WHERE Modified >= '2024-01-01T00:00:00Z'. SharePoint uses UTC time.
commonQueries: SELECT * FROM Items WHERE ListTitle = 'MyList' AND Modified >= '2024-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Documents WHERE LibraryTitle = 'Documents' AND FileType = 'pdf'
SELECT * FROM Items WHERE ListTitle = 'Tasks' AND Status = 'In Progress'
bestPractices: Always filter by Site or List to improve performance
Use ListTitle or ListId to specify target list
Include only necessary fields in SELECT statements
Use appropriate date ranges for Modified/Created filters
Be aware of SharePoint's 5000 item list view threshold

fieldConventions.userFields: Author, Editor fields contain user information. CreatedBy, ModifiedBy reference user objects. Use proper field names based on list configuration.
fieldConventions.dateFields: Created, Modified use DateTime format in UTC. Custom date fields follow SharePoint field naming conventions.
fieldConventions.idFields: ID is the primary key for list items. ListId, SiteId reference parent objects. GUID format is common for SharePoint IDs.

limitations: SharePoint list view threshold of 5000 items may affect large queries
Complex queries may require multiple API calls
Some field types (like multi-value) may need special handling
Permission-based filtering may limit visible results
Large file operations may have size and timeout restrictions
troubleshooting: List view threshold exceeded: Add indexed column filters or reduce result set
Access denied: Check user permissions on site/list/item level
Field not found: Verify field internal names vs display names
Query timeout: Reduce complexity or add more specific filters
Authentication issues: Verify credentials and app permissions
